outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>You put your knee in. You put your knee out. You put your knee in, and you shake it all about. You do the hokey-pokey and turn yourself around. That's what it's all about.</speak>

card.title: Hokey Pokey
card.text: You put your knee in. You put your knee out. You put your knee in, and you shake it all about. You do the hokey-pokey and turn yourself around. That's what it's all about.
